paragraphs.content: Dear and well-beloved brother, Brigham Young, verily thus saith the Lord unto you: My servant Brigham, it is no more required at your hand to leave your family as in times past, for your offering is acceptable to me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Dear and well-beloved brother, Brigham Young, verily thus saith the Lord unto you: My servant Brigham, it is no more required at your hand to leave your family as in times past, for your offering is acceptable to me.

paragraphs.content: I have seen your labor and toil in journeyings for my name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have seen your labor and toil in journeyings for my name.

paragraphs.content: I therefore command you to send my word abroad, and take especial care of your family from this time, henceforth and forever. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I therefore command you to send my word abroad, and take especial care of your family from this time, henceforth and forever. Amen.
